data.name: d20: Sweet Roll Club - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The official compilation of Elisey Kuziakin's compositions from the visual novel «d20: Sweet Roll Club» includes an hour of all tracks in high quality. Compositions contain both intense electronic music and dramatic symphonic melodies.

01. Opening - 1:50
02. Main Menu Theme - 2:06
03. So Casual - 1:31
04. Uncomfortable Situation - 1:43
05. Blurred Fantasies - 2:00
06. Such An Unexpectable Life - 1:47
07. Don't Hold Me - 2:31
08. Melancholic Beauty - 2:44
09. Melancholic Death - 2:44
10. Watching Your Sins - 1:11
11. Some Big Tension - 4:20
12. Some Big Death - 4:20
13. Be Quiet - 2:03
14. Suspense - 0:53
15. Detective Girl - 2:55
16. Stop It - 2:39
17. Medieval, But Not Least - 2:48
18. You Are In The Tavern Now - 2:30
19. Aren't We Heroes - 2:15
20. Great Enough - 2:15
21. The Real Evil - 2:12
22. A Hard Fight - 2:40
23. An Epic Fight - 2:33
24. All We Need Is Peace - 3:05
25. Run - 0:11
Bonus:
26. Opening (d20bit version) - 1:50

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft© Windows© XP or later
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
